sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step"> <x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <applicaiton>HIM</applicaiton> <assignment_group/> <detailed_description/> <expected_result>VERIFY: The charge displays in a new subsection called "Charges to be Accepted upon Closing Section" that displays above the "My Charges" section</expected_result> <number>TS0001793</number> <order>364</order> <prep_step>false</prep_step> <state>draft</state> <sys_created_by>RBUSCH</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-07-19 20:36:11</sys_created_on> <sys_id>17881dd7db9f5b0040f8fcfa0c961983</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>RBUSCH</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-07-19 20:36:11</sys_updated_on> <test>In the preference list, open any of the preference list sections and add a charge by clicking the checkbox next to the code/procedure.</test> <test_script display_value="TES0001002">662811d7db9f5b0040f8fcfa0c9619be</test_script> <testing_user>EDCHRVW</testing_user> </x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step> </record_update>
